Leather Interior
Recently Serviced
Canopy
Mazda

attributes.description: At Mahindra East Rand Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. All Pre-Owned vehicles are 125 point checked, Serviced and Road Ready. We will design a package around your financial needs. All prices exclude administration, delivery and license & registration fees. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks, subject to Bank Approval. Warranty and Service plans available and all vehicles have Tracker Pre-Fitment. Trade-in’s welcome. T’s & C’s Apply.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252650. Conquer any weather or road surface with confidence and style with Nissan X-Trail. Every Element of the X-Trail is designed with a purpose, for pure driving enjoyment. This magnificent SUV comes with an active 6 years/ 150000KM warranty and a 3 years/ 90000KM service plan. Combining 4×4 capability with a sharp premium style, this SUV is a definite stunner. 

We Deliver Countrywide l Trade-ins Accepted l Finance also Available with all major Banks and a Test Drive is a must. Price Excludes License Registration l Administration l Delivery, and on the Road Fees.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277535. The Subaru Forester 2.5i ES AWD Auto has technology to enhance your senses, a striking design that demands a response and performance that makes you feel more alive. The interior of this SUV is finely crafted from luxurious materials and designed to focus on the individual seated inside the cabin. The Subaru Forester comes with a 5 year/ 150 000km Warranty and 3 year/ 75 000 km Maintenance.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
